pr_title: NF: replace sting buffer by builder

timeline.message: NF: replace sting buffer by builder

timeline.bodyText:
Seems like it's IntelliJ, rather than Android Studio, so doesn't use gradle's lint. That's a shame

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <issue id="StringBufferMayBeStringBuilder" severity="fatal"/>
timeline.author: david-allison-1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,6 +30,7 @@
     <issue id="ViewTag" severity="fatal" />
     <issue id="WrongConstant" severity="fatal" />
     <issue id="WrongViewCast" severity="fatal" />
+    <issue id="StringBufferMayBeStringBuilder" severity="fatal"/>
